situation: After witnessing an argument between two teachers, R refused to go to the playground, stating he felt unsafe. He clung to his desk, nervous and unresponsive.
action: The teacher aide told R that it was time to play and attempted to physically guide him by pulling his chair away from the desk. R resisted and became increasingly agitated.
effect: The physical approach only heightened R's anxiety, making him more defiant and uncomfortable. It took 30 more minutes before R could be coaxed into a calmer state by another staff member.
